statements.sql: select `tasks`.`id`, `tasks`.`name`, `tasks`.`description`, `tasks`.`status`, `tasks`.`task_date` as `date`, `folders`.`name` as `folder`, `folders`.`icon` from `tasks` inner join `folders` on `tasks`.`folder_id` = `folders`.`id` where (`tasks`.`user_id` = 2) and `task_date` = '2023-08-11' order by `tasks`.`created_at` desc limit 5
select count(*) as aggregate from `tasks` where `task_date` = '2023-08-11'
